üè†

Close Sidebar

Vertical Stack

iOS 14 +

Notes

Create a vertical stack. This action should be used together with 'List' to pass in the views you want to display next to each other. You can find more info at https://widgetpack.app/documentation

Syntax

verticalStack(alignment: <#Object (HorizontalAlignment)#>, spacing: <#Double#>, content: <#Variable#>)

Example

verticalStack(alignment: HorizontalAlignment(identifier: "HorzontalAlign", displayString: "Horizontal Align"), spacing: 10, content: My Views)
